info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 2 at 11:56PM EDT until October 3 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Miami FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southeast Florida, including the following county, Miami-Dade.
* WHEN...Until 200 AM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1156 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kendall, Doral, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, Sunset, West Kendall, Kendale Lakes, Olympia Heights, The Crossings, University Park, Glenvar Heights, Westchester, Tamiami, Richmond Heights, Fountainbleau, Zoo Miami, Palmetto Bay, Westwood Lakes, Tamiami Fairgrounds and Fiu South Campus. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT FRIDAY
